attributes.action: Stop cars for sale on road side and verges
attributes.additional_details: I beg the Government Minister responsible to approve this petition to stop the sale of cars offered on roadside and verges and extend the distance where 2 cars may be sold to 1 mile between 2 cars offered for sale. To make it an offence to offer such within a distance less than that and authorise Councils, Police Authority or other to fine as appropriate
